title: What are the advantages of being technologically literate? - Quora

response.answer_text: TECHNOLOGY is the KEY, for unleashing ones future, advantages of being technologically literate, can’t be explained, reason being, you can’t just imagine the world with out technology literacy. Today technology literacy, is the most common minimum essential that is required for every one. Technology changes the future in to the way we can never imagine. In simple to say in a single quote, “life without technology is of no fruit, technology with life is of no root.” Being technology literate is just like the minimum necessity of human endurance in today’s world. World without the technology Is like the world of Stone Age. Please consider the technology literacy as the first requirement and minimum necessity of current scenario. Thank You!
You become more valuable if literate with more of the tech that your company uses because you are more useful to them.
